text: Janosch (, born Horst Eckert; 11 March 1931) is a German children's author and illustrator. He was born in Hindenburg, Weimar Republic. His best known work is Janoschs Traumstunde. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Homepage Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:German children's writers Category:German illustrators
title: Janosch
